name: ELEPHANT

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The elephant makes two Gore attacks.

actions.name: Gore
actions.text: Melee Attack Roll: +8, reach 5 ft. Hit: 15 (2d8 + 6) Piercing damage. If the target is a Huge or smaller creature and the elephant moved 20+ feet straight toward it immediately before the hit, the target has the Prone condition.

bonus_actions.name: Trample
bonus_actions.text: Dexterity Saving Throw: DC 16, one creature within 5 feet that has the Prone condition. Failure: 17 (2d10 + 6) Bludgeoning damage. Success: Half damage.

raw_text:
AC 12 	Initiative −1 (9)

DEX 	9 	−1 	−1
